bsml: In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
unrecognizedData: Unrecognized structured data or could not parse the data...
refNotFound: Reference not found in the book
shareNotSupported: Sharing is not supported on this device
wc1: Cumulative frequency of the word GOD
wc2: Cumulative sum of verses where GOD word occurs
includeSearch: Include search screen to the history
keepDetailsOpen: Keep verse details open when using the map
bmdd: You have a note on this bookmark!
backup_hint: Export your notes on one platform and import on another.
backup_hint2: Import your notes from another platform.
searchHint1: Type a word to search in verses, titles, footnotes and appendices
searchHint2a: all words must match in the same verse
searchHint4a: combine multiple references in a single search:
searchHint4b: comma, semicolon or space as separator give the same result
searchHint5: Type a single letter to search on the map
searchHint7: The small indicator in the corner of the search box shows how many times the word occurs in the verses
searchHint8: Tap a result to jump to that location
searchHint9: Multi-select: pick verses, then copy or share as link
searchHint11: Your search and last position are remembered
